comments.author: ksw
comments.content: Just happened to have some ras al hanout in the house and was looking for a simple recipe with peaches. Delicious!  Thanks -  Took the liberty of adding a dollop of marscapone and mint leaves on each plate.

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: Cool! This is one of the very oldest recipes on the site ... it is totally possible that you are the only person besides me ever to have made it, since my audience consisted of about 3 people back then. The addition of mascarpone sounds very nice.
